remarks: Two ways to express the negative of a vector.  (Contributed by NM, 29-Feb-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvzs.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvzs.3 $e |- M = ( -v ` U ) $.
nvzs.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
nvzs.6 $e |- Z = ( 0vec ` U ) $.
nvzs $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( Z M A ) = ( -u 1 S A ) ) $.
